item.description:
Where: British Consulate-General, 1 Broadway, Cambridge, MA

When: February 10, 6pm

You MUST signup & pay on EVENTBRITE!

Register: http://februarysocial.eventbrite.com/

We will be serving international hours d'oeuvres, included in the cost of admission.

Cost: $12 (includes hors d'oeuvres) Online ticket sales end 48 hours before the event; tickets can still be purchased at the door.

NOTE: Drop-in tickets purchased at the door will be $20.
Parking: Garage parking available. Or you can take the T-we'll be near the Kendall T stop.
Follow us on Twitter: @amaboston
Event hashtag: #AMABTU   &   #BIMM

 

 *(see EVENT INFO details on the EVENT BRITE link)

DIGITAL MARKETING FOR THE GLOBAL/SOCIAL MARKETPLACE

The good thing about digital marketing is that it allows you to reach a global audience regardless of the size of your company. But with the reach come new challenges: How do your global customers perceive your brand, especially if your brand identity grew out of a local marketplace? Do you adapt your brand to a global audience, keep it the same, or craft different identities for your global brand--something only big corporations once had to think about?


How do your global customers interact with your brand in ways that are appropriate to their needs and expectations?
How do marcom and market research work in a global context?
How do you measure all this?
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the AMA Event signs
item.why: Join our friends from AMA Boston as Christina Inge hosts a panel of experts who will explore the issues that digital marketers face with the new global challenges and opportunities presented by our increasingly tweet- and Facebook-linked world.
item.name: Join #BIMM & the AMA Social Media Team at the UK Consulate for a Tweetup!
